name: ScoutAlarm
0:
”Alexa, set Scout to away mode.”
”Alexa, disarm Scout.”
”Alexa, is Scout armed?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scout
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Scout is a next-generation home security system that combines cutting-edge hardware design with intuitive, easy-to-use controls. Beautifully designed sensors and low-cost, month-to-month professional monitoring with no long-term contracts make it the best home security system on the market today.

Here are some of the commands you can use with Scout:

- Alexa, arm home mode
- Alexa, arm away mode
- Alexa, disarm the security system
- Alexa, is the back door open?
- Alexa, is my security system armed?

To use this skill you will need a hub and sensors connected to a Scout account. Visit www.scoutalarm.com for more information about our devices and professional monitoring options.

For more information visit our knowledge base at https://support.scoutalarm.com or contact support@scoutalarm.com.
